snippet: In the 1950s and ’60s, artists used silk-screened images in their canvases. Mr. Bismuth is showing the silk screen itself.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit by artist Julien Bismuth at Simone Subal gallery.
lead_paragraph: In the 1950s and ’60s, artists used silk-screened images in their canvases. Mr. Bismuth is showing the silk screen itself.

headline.print_headline: Julien Bismuth: ‘An Image as the _______ of a Surface’
headline.main: Julien Bismuth: ‘An image as the _______ of a surface’
